synthesis_method: The electrolyte synthesis process involves dissolving LiNO3 and LiF powders in HNO3, reacting for 12 hours, drying, sintering at 900°C for 3 days, washing with distilled water, calcining at 600°C, mixing with LiCl powder, adding water to form a gel-like mixture, heat-treating in an autoclave at 600°C for 2 hours in an oxygen atmosphere, and finally drying to obtain Li3-xClO1-xHalx (Li2.963ClO0.963F0.037).
